articles.title: 2022 Ford Bronco Heritage Edition spy shots: Retro touches on the way - Motor Authority
articles.description: Ford looks to be readying what's likely to be the first of many special-edition versions of its modern Bronco.
articles.content:
Ford's modern Bronco hasn't even reached dealerships but the automaker is already preparing some new variants.
